text: The Buccaneer is a 1958 American adventure movie directed by first time director Anthony Quinn and starring Inger Stevens, Henry Hull, Claire Bloom, Charles Boyer, Charlton Heston, Lorne Greene, Robert Warwick, E. G. Marshall. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures and is a remake of the 1938 movie of the same name. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1958 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in the 1810s Category:Movies set in New Orleans
title: The Buccaneer (1958 movie)
